desc: Looking for the best towel to dry your car, boat, truck bike or anything after a wash? Let us show you the QuickDry microfibre towel, your new best friend to get a great result after giving your vehicle (or anything else) a wash!

layout.text: Dry your car in just 60 seconds.
Introducing the QuickDry ultra absorbent microfibre towel; Get the best result after giving your vehicle (or anything else) a wash!
